title: Heat Metal
content: Heat Metal Level 2 Transmutation Spell 2~16 Damage 2d8Fire Cause a metal weapon or armour to glow red-hot and force the creature touching it to let go or receive Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and Ability Checks. If the creature is only wearing metal armour, it always receives Disadvantage. If the creature is still touching the metal, you can use a bonus action on subsequent turns to deal another 2~16 Fire damage and force the creature to let go or receive Disadvantage. 10 turns 18m CON Save Conce
